messages.subject: meeting unschooled kids as adults
messages.msgSnippet: I have an acquaintance who was unschooled, Kate Cayley, who is Jutta Mason s daughter and she is lovely.  She is also the mom of a two year old.  She didn t
messages.messageBody:
I have an acquaintance who was unschooled, Kate Cayley, who is Jutta Mason's
daughter and she is lovely. She is also the mom of a two year old. She
didn't read until she was nine.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-xxYJZT5YTo

As you can see she is involved in theatre and she became a teacher.

There is documentary film-maker Astra Taylor, whom I have never met.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LwIyy1Fi-4Q

The other two adult women(in their thirties) who were unschooled I met were
articulate mothers who graduated from university.(One had a masters)

I have met unschooling teens at Conferences and they seemed happy,
passionate, confident and very polite.

You can also see Sandra's daughter Holly Dodd on YouTube, as well as other
life-learning teens if you look.

Marina

--


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
